The darkness began to fade... dawn came rousing you only when the sun touched your face. Groaning, you ease yourself into a sitting position, looking around you inexplicably find yourself in a grassy plain dominated by tall grey green wide stalks topped with purple and azure seed pods.

"Where...am...I? Dude...where's my car?!" Standing up you barely top the grasses around you, but you can see a bright moon...no scratch that two moons in the sky, your heart stops beating for just a milisecond as you take in the sky. While the moons cross and fade into the sky you notice it turns a soft blue promising a warm start to the day.

Staring into the sky you failed at seeing the shadows that dawn failed to dispel. They slipped soundlessly around you completing a circle. They tightened the noose you would't have even noticed if one of the shadows let out a low predatory growl as it leaped for your throat. Reflexes kicked in barely, your bent backwards as the shadow passes mere centimeters across your face, twisting to your right you spy two more descending from the apexes of their leaps, you're no martial artist but you throw up a strong blocking arm as you remember seeing in the many kung fu films you've been known to watch. The body was solidly bulky but strangely soft and fuzzy at the same time you abstrctedly noticed before you were overwhelmed by the five others. Once again darkness claimed you.

The next time you came too your arms were bound to a pole buried partially in the ground, your feet were tied and you most of your clothing you noticed was piled just out of your reach leaving you in only your boxers. There was sounds of camp all around you, laughing, snarky banter, and heated arguements.
Shuffling youself to the left you see three tents surrounding a small campfire, on a spit something was roasting rather nicely the scent awakened your stomach and boy did it growl loudly, so loud it halted conversations all around camp.
Movement out of the corner of your eye made you turn and look, your jaw dropped in utter shock, standing above you was a 6' 5" if she was an inch honest to goodness anthropormorphic lioness, her build was sturdy, big but yet lean musculature backing an hourglass figure that pornstars would kill for. Two strips of cloth crisscrossed her chest bound around two bronze rings. The female lioness also wore a short leather or scale looking skirt studded with studs along the panels, she had green eyes and a pink tongue and short black hair.

"Tyan ntanna waligo?" She spoke, a odd look in her eyes made you think she was sizing you up for the next spit roasting item.
"Hel-l-lo? Listen, do you speak English? I'm sorry but I don't know where I am...," you begin speaking.
"E'kta e'kta! Tyan juiju mamaweka!" She shouted over her shoulder the second part.
Somebody else moved into view, a younger version of the female, a child or sister perhaps, you weren't sure but she was lithe and strong looking as well. She set a dish in front of yor legs then retreated unafraid of you but watching predatorally just the same.
The larger more busty liones dipped her paws, yes paws, her palms still had the pads and her fingertips did too, into the bowl. Scooping its contents onto her fingers she pushed them to your face and bracing yourself for what you most assuredly thought was a dry rub or marinade, she annointed your throat and each ear then withdrew.
"Tyan ntanna weligo? Ty-Who're you young one?" She suddenly spoke in clear English...at least you assumed she was but the stuff she rubbed you with suddenly burned and tingled for a very brief moment, when it died down you gasped for a breath of air, looked her right in those eyes and said.
"Bwet'nagisu, tyan ntanna weligo polnnu somm R'srwtan Jonathan-fusa."
You blinked in surprise at the sounds you just made. Looking up at her she clapped her paws delightedly for some reason,
"R'srwtan Johnathan-fusa...Master Johnathan, you are expected here, welcome to the queendom of the pridelands! My queen wishes to meet you most eagerly!" She turned to the smaller version of herself, "Run to the capital tell Queen Nala of the Seven Prides that the Master Johnathan of the prophesy has arrived!"

141.content:
"What the-! Who are you, and why are you in my bedchambers?!" A voice shouts, rousing you from unconsciousness.

"W-whuh...? Oh, my head." You groan as you push yourself up, but as the bleariness clears from your vision, your speech trails off, your mouth dropping open at the being in front of you.

Standing before you is perhaps the most goddamn curvy woman you've ever seen. Long legs, thick thighs, large ass, wide hips, slim waist, and tits... dear god those TITS. They hang out proudly from open front of the thin silken gown she wears, and each one is easily as large as your torso, nearly completely covering her stomach and with perky erect nipples that you could swear are leaking a bit of milk. Her shoulders are broad, and you can see a good deal of toned muscle on her frame - clearly, this woman works out. But despite her absolutely gorgeous body, it's pretty obvious that this mysterious woman isn't human. A long tail tipped with a tuft of black fur flicks White fur covers her from around the cloven hooves she has instead of feet to the top of her head, which is definitely the head of a cow, albeit one with quite human-like features and a head of smooth shoulder-length raven hair, complete with a pair of small but sharp-looking horns and cow-like ears

"I said..." The cow-woman repeats herself, snapping you out of your staring. "Who are you, and what are you doing in my bedroom?"

"U-uh, I'm Jack." You stutter out. "Jack Westfield, f-from Chicago?"

The bovine female snarls. "Lying about your homeland will not save you, whelp!" She growls, grabbing you by the collar of your shirt and lifting you up effortlessly - as she does so, you realize that the woman isn't just stacked, she's tall. You're not a very big guy, only about 5'4", and this cow lady towers over you by at least a foot or two.

"I-I'm not lying!" You stammer out, struggling in vain. "Y-you know, Chicago? Windy City, in Illinois? United States of America? On Earth?"
The cow-woman's glare tells you all you need to know.

"Shit," You groan. "I'm either high, dead, or in some kind of alternate cow dimension." Given that you're pretty sure that hallucinations can't lift you by the throat and that you can't feel things while you're dead, the latter option is the only one left.
"Wait." The cow interrupts, releasing her hold on you and letting you fall to the ground. "You say you're from another world?"
"Unless you're a hallucination, and I doubt you are, then yeah." You reply.

The cow's furious look immediately changes to one of surprise and delight at that. "That's... that's perfect, then! You're really the one. Out of all the queendoms, you fell into mine, and right at my feet. This must be a sign!"
"W-what?" You ask bewilderedly.
"To make a long story short, your arrival here has been prophesized." The cow explains. "It was foretold that a male would come from another world to wed at least one of the queens of this land. It's been thousands of years, but it finally happened! You're the one!"
Your mouth drops open at this. "I'm... I'm gonna marry you?" You splutter.
The cow nods enthusiastically, beaming with delight. "Yep! Oh, I totally forgot! My name is Clara, queen of the central farmlands." She giggles a bit at your dumbstruck expression, then composes herself again. "But first, there's something we need to do to make the whole thing official."
"And that is...?" You ask nervously, unsure of what's about to happen. If you could get married, nonetheless to a freaking cow of royal blood, within five seconds of arriving here, you're honestly ready for anything.
"Oh, it's nothing much." Clara clarifies. "We just need to..."

1552.content:
You awake with one hell of a hangover from last nights festivities. 6 shots of whisky probably wasn’t the best idea after those beers. Opening your eyes to surprisingly bright sunlight you block it out with your hand. After a few moments to collect your thoughts you realize two things. One your laying on a hard floor that feels like dirt and two it smells and sounds like your outside. Birds chirp all around you and the soft feel of grass caresses your uncovered arms and back.

Looking down at your body you realize that you have no shirt on but luckily your pants survived the party. Now that you’re no longer looking at the sky you notice just how odd your situation is. Rolling green fields spread out in every direction with a few tree here or there to break up the horizon. No matter where you look all you can see is vibrant grassy plains.

Closing your eyes again you think about who you will be killing once you get back home. Will it be Rob your crazy party addicted college friend or that sketchy dude. Who sold you those pills he claimed were ecstasy. Either way one of them is dead as soon as you get the energy to stand.

After giving yourself some time to allow the pounding headache to ease up a bit. You pull yourself into a sitting position. Scanning the horizon one more time you see nothing man made anywhere. Not a single telephone pole or one of those giant power cable tower things. Now you’re really annoyed that some asshole ditched you with literally nothing to find your way to civilization with.

Grunting in frustration you stand up steadying yourself as the world spins for a moment. Defiantly going easy on the sauce next time. If there is a next time first you need to get out of here wherever here is

Since nothing looks promising in any direction you decide to head to the closest tree. Some shade would be nice with how warm it is. You walk the few hundred yards to a large tree that provides plenty of cool shade for you to rest in. Sitting Indian style you watch the wind blow through the grass making its sway back and forth. The tree seems to be on a high point of this plain giving you a great view of the surrounding area. Not much catches your eye only a large mountain chain off to your left breaks up the monotony of the blue horizon.

After a short time staring off into the distance you notice something moving in your direction. At first its nothing but a couple of dots but as they get closer you can distingues color. Several black, white, and brown specks are headed in your general direction. You hope its some people out sight seeing or hunting really you don’t care as long as they find you.

When their within what you assume to be yelling distance you cup your hands over your mouth. Yelling as loud as you can your voice echo’s off into the distance. The dots stop and shuffle about for a moment. You yell again and watch as they group together. Frustrated you stand up. Yelling and waving your hands you finally think you’ve gotten their attention.

The dots seem to be moving a bit faster toward you but it’s still going to be a while before you can tell who or what they are. So you settle back down mainly to calm your rolling stomach and pouncing head. Lying on the cool grass your eyelids get heavy. Yawing you stretch your arms out and doze off content to wait for you rescuers to arrive.

Footsteps pull you from your light nap. Several what you hope are people are headed toward you pushing their way through to thigh length grass. Remain lying down since A your still pretty hungover and B your pretty comfortable where you are at the moment. Keeping an eye out you watch for someone to emerge from the grass that obscures most of your vision.

A horses head appears just above the grass it glances about its ears turning following the chirps of the birds and the insects. It look right past you toward the tree behind you before glancing over to another horse that has step forward next to it.

Then they do something that makes you second guess if you’re even awake yet, they speak. Its not English since you can’t understand a single word of whatever it is. Somehow you recognize it as one of those Native American languages you’ve heard in old westerns or on the history channel. Convinced that it’s the horses riders that are speaking you sit up startling the two of them and stunning yourself.

You blink your eyes as these creatures step away from you surprised. Instead of two horses you see two horse heads on rather attractive women’s bodies. The fur appears to cover all of them but that’s the only thing making it seem like they’re not naked. Not a single article of clothing cover their chests or groin. Exposing some very nice female attributes.

You stare at one another for several moments before one of them takes a hesitant step forward and speaks. She has Chestnut colored fur across her body with only a small diamond shape patch of white on her forehead. Her face is well shaped like a horses! Wide eyes, ears on top and a long muzzle the whole nine yards.

She repeats herself since you didn’t answer the first time as you were checking out her looks. She speaks in a rapid Native American accent again and points at you. Those pills that dude gave you were worth every penny.

She looks at her friends and they talk back and forth for several minutes while you just observer your surroundings. By now several more of these acid trip produced creatures have joined the others. They come in every color of horse you’ve ever seen, Black, white, different shades of brown, grey and mixes of all four.

You count fifteen in this group all of them female for some odd reason. They continue to speak among themselves for several minutes until a blonde colored mare steps to with arms reach of you. She smiles and speaks her native tongue again making an upward motion. Figuring she want you to stand you get up stumbling a bit as you do.

The blonde mare reaches out and helps you steady yourself. Her fur is soft and warm and you catch a faint whiff of her scent which smells like freshly cut grass. She smiles at you again and pats your shoulder before taking a step back.

She speaks again this time in a language that sounds like German! “Was ist ihr name?”

“Nein” you reply “I speak English not German horse lady”

“Sie Sprechen Englisch”? she says

“Yes I speak English, if that what you’re asking.” You respond to her with an exaggerated thumbs up “Man when the hell did my brain learn German? And why can’t I use it unless I’m high as a kite” you mutter aloud

“I’m confused” the mare says with a slight accent you can’t quiet place. It’s a mix between German and Native American “Why are you high like a kite?”

“That’s a bold question coming from the horse lady my drugged mind created. At least it made you guys sexy and naked I’m not bored anymore!” You say with a grin.

The yellow mare blushes and looks away smiling. “You find us attractive?”

“Hell yea! You have a sexy body and those horse heads are pretty cute as well. I’m loving this trip. Hey I wonder if I can feel you” Reaching forward you grab the yellow mares right breast and squeeze feel the soft fur covering an even softer lobe of flesh. Since this is a dream everything should go just fine!

Of course your brain seems to hate you.

The mare stumbles back surprised by our sudden touch. Her blush deepens. You can see it clearly through her fur now. One of the black mares steps toward you. You reach forward hoping to get another handful of tit. Suddenly A spear tip is pressed against your belly poking you just under your navel.

Several more of the mare’s advance on you, spears ready. You raise yours hands into the air attempting to show you mean no harm. They yell at you in their native tongue. Thrusting their spears violently in your direction. You take several steps back trying to give yourself some space. The spear tip that poked your stomach just a moment ago felt very real and the small cut it gave you stung sharply. Maybe this wasn’t a dream after all!

As you continue to retreat your foot catches on an exposed root making you lose your balance. You fall backwards the sky and tree branches above flash past your vision. Your head smacks into the solid trunk of the tree with a loud crack.

You fall to the ground head pounding and your vison starts to narrow. You can see several of the mares have rushed forward with concerned looks on their faces. The blonde furred mare kneels down next to you and strokes your face. She says something you can’t quite make out as your vision fades to black.
1552.title: Found by her people

info.brief_description: One human male. Eight Queendoms of hot furry females. What could possibly go wrong?
info.description:
You´re a normal guy who were minding his own business, and the next thing you know you´ve been transported to another world populated by furries!

This world is divided in eight different Queendoms; the Queendom of the Jungle, the Queendom of the Desert, the Queendom of the Pride Lands, the Queendom of the Farmlands, the queendom of the Forrests, the Queendom of the Mountains, the queendom of the Hindus and finally the Queendom of the Winter-lands. All are ruled by different queens, who´re all not just beautiful but also cunning, seductive AND lustful. In this world there are a very few males (because of war, diseases etc.), and females therefore have a hard time finding mates, since they´re VERY LUSTFUL and most of the time IN HEAT. A prophecy says that a male from another world would come, and be wed to one of the queens (or maybe two or three or all of them!) and the females in the kingdoms would get to have SEX with him! And that lucky male is going to be YOU!


A little info about these Queendoms:

The Jungle:
Their culture is like the aztec and the mayan (except the human sacrifices!), and they worship two gods; the god of the hunt and the goddess of fertility (for females giving birth to new warriors and hunters, male or female).
Their queen is a lizard named Zira, she´s 7 feet tall, have purple colored scales, emerald green eyes, huge breasts (like two beachballs!), large ass, wide hips and thin waist.

The Desert:
Their culture is like the ancient Egyptian, and they worship three gods; the god of the rivers, the goddess of love and the god of war.
Their queen is a anubian jackal named Nefertiri, she´s 6 feet tall, have black hair, dark grey fur, deep golden eyes, large breasts (like two watermelons!), huge ass, wide hips and thin waist.

The Pride Lands:
Their culture is like the native african tribes (before the europeans), and they worship one goddess; the goddess of mating.
Their queen is a lioness named Nala, she´s 6 1/2 feet tall, have sand colored fur, blue eyes, big breast (like two basketballs!), big ass, wide hips and thin waist.

The Farmlands:
their culture is a peaceful one, they prefer peace and farming before war and they worship three gods; the goddess of fertility, the goddess of love and the goddess of mating.
Their queen is a cow named Clara, she's less than 7 feet tall, have white fur with black spots, brown eyes, humongous breasts which is most of the time lactating, wide hips and thin waist.

The Forrests:
Their culture is like the native american tribes, and they worship the goddess of nature, to whom they pray trough mating.
Thiel queen is a fox named Vixie, she´s about 6 feet tall, have red fur, green eyes, big breasts, wide hips and thin waist.

The Mountains:
Their culture is like the barbaric tribes (in Europe), and they worship two gods; the god of war and the god of thunder.
Their queen is a eagle named Ella, she´s 6 1/2 feet tall, have brown and white feathers, dark brown eyes, big breasts, wide hips and thin waist.

The Hindus:
Their culture is like the old kingdoms of India, and they worship two gods; the god of the rivers and the goddess of love.
Their queen is a tigress named Bala, she´s nearly 7 feet tall, have orange fur with black stripes, blue eyes, huge breasts, wide hips and thin waist.

The Winter-lands:
Their culture is like the norse vikings, and they worship three gods; the god of war, the goddess of mating and the goddess of fertility.
Their queen is a wolfess named Sigrid, she´s 7 feet tall, have dark grey fur, blue eyes, large breasts, wide hips and thin waist.


You can be found by either one of the queens or by their subjects. If one or more of the female subjects find you they´ll either take you to their queen or keep you for themselves for a little while!

A few rules:

1. All furries have arms and legs, Including the snakes!

2. The main character is male and must not killed

3. This story will have romance, sex and other mature content.

4. Try to add long chapters (a paragraph at least)

5. The females can be 5 to 7 feet tall

6. All the females are very voluptuous (breasts, ass, hips etc.)

7. Check wikipedia for culture-information.

Enjoy, and please add!

Reward: 1000 Gps per chapter
